name: Lovely Candies Pop
description:
Lovely Candies Pop is a very addictive match-two game!
Tap on two or more candies to make them crush, create a new high score is game winner!
Clear the candies by your finger, and enjoy sweet taste!

Features:
- 3 game modes: easy, normal, hard.
- Last bonus will give you a surprise.

How to play:
- Tap two or more candies of the same type.
- The more candies you clear, the more score you will get.
- All the candies is cleared, you'll win a big last bonus.

Free download this fun puzzle game, you'll love it!
